login.polycraftool.remember: to save your Polycraft password in Polycraftool
login.polycraftool.saved: Successfully saved password. Auto-login is enabled for future connections.
text.autoconfig.polycraftool.option.pass: When set, Polycraftool will attempt to auto-login when joining Polycraft
text.autoconfig.polycraftool.option.disp: Player names (tab menu and player label)
text.autoconfig.polycraftool.option.enab: By default, Polycraftool detects when you're playing on Polycraft and only enables its features in this case
By enabling this setting, Polycraftool will be active on all servers and local worlds too
